jcr:content.jcr:title: You Think It's Like This but Really It's Like This

contentheadline.headline: You Think It's Like This but Really It's Like This

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = You Think It's Like This but Really It's Like This | Type = studio | Artist = [[Mirah]] | Cover = You_think_it's_like_this.jpg | Released = June 6, 2000 | Recorded = ??? | Genre = [[Indie rock]] | Length = 45:22 | Label = [[K Records|K]] | Producer = [[Mirah]], [[Phil Elvrum]] | Last album = ''[[Storageland EP]]''<br />(1997) | This album = '''''You Think It's Like This but Really It's Like This'''''<br />(2000) | Next album = ''[[Advisory Committee]]''<br />(2001) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1score = {{Rating|4|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r483710}}</ref> }} '''''You Think It's Like This but Really It's Like This''''' is [[Mirah]]'s debut [[album]]. ==Track listing== #"Million Miles" – 1:55 #"Sweepstakes Prize" – 4:49 #"Of Pressure" – 3:53 #"This Dance" – 2:26 #"La Familia" – 2:53 #"Gone Sugaring" – 1:19 #"Person Person" – 2:21 #"Engine Heart" – 2:35 #"Archipelago" – 4:23 #"100 Knives" – 3:53 #"Murphy Bed" – 2:19 #"Pollen" – 2:27 #"Small Town" – 1:17 #"Water and Sleep" – 4:00 #"Telephone Wires" – 2:30 #"Words Cannot Describe" – 2:22 ==Engine Heart== This song was used for the soundtrack of the film [[Love and Other Drugs]]. {{citation needed|date=March 2012}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{2000s-alt-rock-album-stub}} [[Category:Mirah albums]] [[Category:2000 debut albums]]
